    public class PlanViewerImp
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements PlanViewer, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener
    PlanViewerImp class implements a component to display plans graphically.
    Since:
    1.0
